title: Should He Fire His Friend Over This Offense Or Give Him A Second Chance?
description:
Working with your friend can present many challenges and test your friendship. The worst-case scenario is if you're in the position of having to fire a friend who you helped get the job.
So what do you do in that situation? Moe's friend is currently going through this with another friend of his. Listen...
